verses.verse: Make <S%H430>haste<s%>, O God, to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H2363>me<s%>; make haste to <S%H5833>help<s%> <S%H3068>me<s%>, O Lord.

Let them be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> and <S%H2659>confounded<s%> that <S%H1245>seek<s%> after my <S%H5315>soul<s%>: let them be <S%H5472>turned<s%> <S%H268>backward<s%>, and put to <S%H3637>confusion<s%>, that <S%H2655>desire<s%> my <S%H7451>hurt<s%>.
Let them be turned <S%H7725>back<s%> for a <S%H6118>reward<s%> of their <S%H1322>shame<s%> that <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H1889>Aha<s%>, <S%H1889>aha<s%>.

Let all those that <S%H1245>seek<s%> you <S%H7797>rejoice<s%> and be <S%H8055>glad<s%> in <S%H157>you<s%>: and let such as love your <S%H3444>salvation<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%>, Let <S%H430>God<s%> be <S%H1431>magnified<s%>.

But I am <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy<s%>: make <S%H2363>haste<s%> unto <S%H430>me<s%>, O God: you are my <S%H5828>help<s%> and my <S%H6403>deliverer<s%>; O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, make no <S%H309>tarrying<s%>.
